runs.comm: starts off back of a length, and it is chopped away to third man
slight shape away from Jayasuriya, the left-armer's outswinger, but nothing threatening. Jaya runs it down to third man
short ball, pretty sharp, Dilshan misses on the pull and is hit in the ribs; they come through for a leg bye nevertheless
back of a length, Jaya goes back in the crease, plays it wide of mid-off, and runs through
flicked it down to fine-leg boundary, this one was shortish, came in towards the batsman, and he placed it to fine leg. There is no fine leg in place, and this one was fast too, at 143ks
cramps him up around off stump, but he bunts it down towards point and takes a single
again back of a length, off-stump line, no room to hit
same length, but this time he gives him room. Dilshan cuts, but can't beat Yuvraj at cover-point
this one jagged back in, Dilshan plays it towards mid-on and scampers through right away. Debutant Dinda underarm-flicks and runs the stumps down, but third umpire finds that Dilshan is in
stays back of a length again, just outside off, Jayasuriya plays it towards point
Jaya is frustrated a touch, steps out too early, Ishant fires in another sharp short delivery, the batsman misses by a long way
that is a beauty, 139ks, pitched back of a length, around middle, leaves Jayasuriya, and somehow misses the edge. Good carry here for Ishant
Dilshan is beaten this time. The length is back again, 141ks, Dilshan looks to make room but is cramped up by the inward movement
this one in straighter, on the pads, and he takes a single to wide of mid-on
looks to manufacture another shot, a flick across the line from outside off, and misses by a long way. Is saved on the lbw appeal because it hits him outside the line
keeps the length back still, punched away off the back foot, to the right of mid-off
misfield at cover-point, it slips out of Yuvraj's hands, and they come through for one
pushes to cover and gets a single, tight bowling so far
the first length delivery of the innings, angled across Jaya, who throws his arms at it and misses by a long way
plays and misses again, shorter, and wider, and Jaya goes for the big cut, only to be beaten by the extra bounce and away movement
Yuvraj is feeling slippery, he has dropped a sitter, Jayasuriya plays a nothing shot to cover-point, not much power behind it, goes at a comfortable head height, but it slips out again
full delivery, this time Dilshan looks to manufacture a shot, looks to make room, and is beaten. The ball misses the leg stump not by much
he has his hopping with the shorter one this time, off-stump line, giving him no room, they steal a leg bye though
another one on the body, Jayasuriya looks to make room, Ishant follows, short ball, 138ks, and finds the elbow of the batsman
bouncer this time, Jayasuriya looks to pull, and is beaten down the leg side
finally Jayasuriya gets one of his shots through - not very clean but effective, it was full and wide, and he connected well enough to clear the off-side ring
much better, very nice shot, takes this from outside off, and short-arm-pulls it to square-leg boundary
is beaten this time, steps out, makes room, and Nehra keeps the length back and beats him with the extra bounce
he was expecting the shorter one, was in position and pulled it to the midwicket boundary
another short delivery, down the leg side though - good over so far for Sri Lanka
Nehra stays short of a length, but strays on the pads, and Jayasuriya has to just feather it past the short fine leg
action replay of the previous delivery, short, into the pads, flicked past short fine - five boundaries off the over, and two wides. You never drop Jaya, Yuvraj will have learnt
length ball, driven straight, Ishant does well to get low and field
he has threaded this through the off-side field, stands tall and crashes a back-of-a-length delivery to wide of mid-off
is beaten on the pull again, he sees it early but is late into the shot
another drop, where is Mike Young? this one stops at Dilshan, easy return offer Ishant just to his left, and he grasses it after three attempts
and he plays and misses a bouncer again, this time he looks for the square cut but is done in by the extra bounce
hit with open face towards cover-point, and Yuvraj again fails to collect cleanly, this one doesn't cost them though
starts off back of a length, around off, and Jaya defends towards cover

finally they take a catch, and it's Ishant at third man who takes the catch. he should have had both openers out by now. But coming back, this is another bouncer, and Jayasuriya upper-cuts it, straight down the throwat of third man, where Ishant creates semi-drama and takes it inches off the ground
cut away fiercely, this one is short and gives him the slightest of rooms, and he uses the bowler's pace to good effect
effective deflection, this is back of a length again, and Dilshan looks to cut but gets an under edge fine of third man
he is beaten outside off again, throws his arms at it again, and misses
cut away and Gambhir at third man is alert enough to keep Dilshan to one
flat, just outside off, runs it down to short third for one
another flat delivery, from round the stumps into the pads, and Sanga gets off the mark with one to midwicket
Dilshan sweeps and the top edge carries over Yuvraj at short fine leg
pulls the length back, Dilshan helps it towards square leg and gets a single
short, Sanga plays with soft hands towards wide long-on, Yusuf runs back and keeps them down to one
turn for Yusuf, Dilshan is bemused, this one turns from outside off to hit him outside leg
and he is not given the best of the welcome, lofted over his head, effortlessly by Sanga, all timing and placement
he has swept this one with precision, from just outside off, and he bisects square leg and midwicket, all along the ground
and this one is even better, Sanga comes down the track, gets to the pitch of it, and lofts it again - effortless, just a bit more aerial
arm ball, almost as if he is expecting it, and runs it down to short third for one
Yuvraj makes a diving save to his wrong side at cover, just a single
stays flat and full to Sanga, who drives him down to long-off - 17 off the over
Sanga reverse-hits Yusuf, but hits it straight to deep point
driven against the turn, but sweeper-cover keeps them down to one
another effortless lofted shot from Sanga, this one is angled into him and he goes wide of long-on
no risk this time, takes a single to midwicket
and they steal a one, dropping it just off the pitch
another misfield - in the deep this time, by Rohit Sharma. Sanga dances down the track, Yusuf fires it in, and he works it towards deep midwicket where Sharma lets it slip through
short, into the pads, turned away to deep backward square
swept away straight down the ground, gets a single to long-on
steps down the track, is not close to the pitch of the ball, still gets a single to cover, good shot against the spin
how did that miss? goes for the switcheroo again, and is it's too full for it, just misses what would have been the leg stump
this time Dilshan reverses, connects, but gets just one to short fine
regular sweep this time, this goes down the ground and gets him a single
nice shot, makes room, takes this one from in front of leg, and beats the point fielder, and takes two
another aerial chip, effortless shot again, takes the length ball and clears mid-on easily
it's mid-off who watches the ball go over his head; this is short because mid-off is up, but Sanga goes down the ground still and clears mid-off
yorker, Sanga goes for a quick single to cover, Raina hits the stumps direct, but it is not required - and an overthrow ensues
mis-hit for two, short delivery at , hurrying him up, it goes off the face of the bat, but wide of cover
yorker, and Sanga gets a single down to mid-off
and what a way to get to his fifty - the straight six again - smooth, just the clean straight loft, 50 off 21 balls - joint-quickest for Sri Lanka
drives this down to long-on for one
he's bowled him, Dilshan comes down the track, and is cramped for room and yorks himself too. Misses, and is bowled

another misfield, by Pathan at midwicket, Jayawardene comes in and plays a nice little shot to midwicket, they put pressure on Pathan who takes his eyes off the ball, fumbles and allows them to come for two
played straight to square leg this time
deflects this one wide of square leg, and gets one
lovely late-cut, makes room, takes it from in front of stumps, and guides it to the point boundary
another couple, he guides it to wide of long-on and runs hard

looks for another late cut, this one is slower in the air, and he is early into the shot, is beaten and the ball shaves the off stump. MJ waits for the replay to just make sure, and is sent on his way
fired down the leg side, Kapugedera gets a feather on it and takes four
steps down, plays with soft hands, and Sangakkara pushes him for a two to just wide of long-on
comes down the ground again, plays it with soft hands to the left of deep square leg and comes back for a couple
goes for the sweep, misses it, but gets a leg-bye
back of a length, pushed down the ground for a single
dances down the track, and hits this one straight to long-on
slogged away to wide of long-on, right in his arc and he goes with the spin too. It lands just inside the boundary
another slog, but this one is shorter, and he gets an inside edge onto the pad
another return catch dropped, but this one is drilled back at Rohit powerfully, he gets both his hands to it but it comes at him too fast
back of a length, hit back to the right of the bowler who prevents a single by sticking his foot out
goes for the reverse sweep-heave, and misses completely, the lbw appeal is negated because it is heading down what would have been the leg side
chips down the ground again, and gets one down to long-on
looks to main room, gets the bottom part of the bat and runs through for one
nice lofted six, comes down the track again, and it seems it is just a chip shot on the up, but it keeps going and going and clears long-off

another changes goes, easy run-out opportunity, Sehwag is left laughing. First Sanga edges it to short of Dhoni, but Kapu wants the single, and Dhoni's throw - albeit wide - reaches Ishant in time. Ishant knows not whether to run to the stumps or throw them down direct. He does a mix of both, and in the end misses the stumps
that's insult to injury, Sangakkara steps down, takes a shortish delivery and pulls it to the square-leg boundary
smart shot, sees the mid-off is inside the circle, and takes a short delivery, clears the front leg, and goes over that fielder
moves around in the crease this time, Ishant gets the yorker in, and just a single comes
lovely shot, stands tall, makes slight room, takes a back-of-a-length delivery and smokes it over extra cover
goes for the yorker, misses the length by inches, and he crashes it to sweeper-cover for two
good shot, goood shot, is expecting a yorker, walks across the stumps, and takes it on the full and scoops - rather helps it along - it over fine leg
short ball, Sanga goes across the line, but is beaten by the low bounce
another dot, this time he is beaten by the extra pace, 138ks, and is late on the cut
misses the yorker again, ends up a nice fulltoss, and he clears midwicket easily, to get to his highest T20 score
makes room and crashes it through the off side, comes back for two
goes for the hit over fine leg again, but this time Dinda keeps it short, and he misses it
what a shot, lovely shot, Kapu stands tall, gets under this length ball, and lofts it over extra cover - no fuss at all
Nehra goes short this time, and goes for four again - seven boundaries off his last eight legal deliveries... pulled over square leg easily this time
make it eight fours off last nine deliveries from Nehra - this is a low fulltoss, he hets under it and opens the face too, over point it goes
another boundary, short and wide and he slaps it over point - superb shot, poor bowling, and that's the 50 for Nehra
finally a non-boundary, but this time there is a fumble at long-on to make up for it, this was almost a yorker driven down to long-on where Rohit Sharma fumbles and lets him come back for the second

and he has got a wicket with the first slower ball of the night; Kapu swipes across the line and misses. What a nice cameo, had he connected he would have broken Sanga's and MJ's Sri Lanka record for the fastest fifty
what an incredible shot - it's a reverse sweep, which almost carries for six to fine leg. Or is it third man? Of course it is third man. No change in grip either
what a joke, another drop, another sitter, Sanga has top-edged, and Ishant gets under the ball and drops at deep midwicket
Indian fielders on a hat-trick, Mathews is dropped this time, at mid-off, tough chance for Ojha who dives but can't make to it
slogged out of the ground, what a monster hit, length ball, flat and it;s out of the ground. The highest India have conceded
only Mathews could have taken this catch, but he is batting here. He hits another aerial shot down the ground, and it Rohit Sharma at long-on by inches

the first good bit of fielding by India, hit down to long-on again, Rohit fumbles again, Sanga comes back for two but the throw is good, and Yusuf deflects it cleverly onto the stumps to catch Sanga short
